DOC.brief_summary: The propose study randomize clinical trial investigate effect weight gain eat dysregulation prevention intervention among college freshman woman . It compare Appetite Awareness Training ( AAT ) standard nutritional education group treatment control group . Appetite Awareness Training approach increase eat regulation training individual eat response appetite cue rather external emotional cue .
DOC.brief_title: A Brief Appetite Awareness Intervention Eating Weight Regulation Among College Freshmen
DOC.detailed_description: All female freshman student reside university dorm recruit participate study . After complete baseline assessment , eligible participant randomly assign one three arm . Those AAT condition receive guided administration AAT course three weekly group session , additional booster session three week completion ( week 6 ) . The standard treatment comparison group receive four similarly time group session psychoeducational/nutrition information facilitate registered dietician . A manualized approach administration intervention create base AAT treatment strictly follow order standardize implementation prevention group . The no-treatment control group participate assessment .
